modName: General Falx Carius Armor Playable and Temperable
summary: This mod makes the General Carius Armor from the Dragonborn DLC playable and temperable.
descriptionHtml:
This mod makes the whole armor from General Falx Carius playable and temperable.

I have changed the stats to be equal to Dragonbone armor, fixed some keywords and renamed the gauntlets, helmet and boots to "General Carius' ...". You can temper the armor with one Steel ingot per piece.

The armor is found on General Falx Carius on Solstheim, so you obviously need the [b]Dragonborn DLC[/b].

Please report any bugs and/or improvement suggestions.

[i]I have used the "General Falx Carius Armor Playable" mod by NCRForever (http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33329/?) as a base.[/i]
author: NCRForever and MrSpeks
